column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////No tapas meal can be complete without some sangria
column2: and in this Ba-Ba-Reeba delivers again...perfectly.  We had the black raspberry
column4: and the special of the day
column5: mango.  Each one has enough fruit essence to trick you into thinking you were getting your daily vitamins
column6: and enough alcohol to make the first part easier.  It was just simply perfect.
